basic.floral_language:
Helianthus annuus
Floriogrphy: sunny, warm, and optimistic.

The name sunflower may derive from the fact that shape of the flower's head resembles the sun, or from the false impression that the blooming plant appears to slowly turn its flower towards the sun as the latter moves across the sky on a daily basis. Generally, there is only a single large golden inflorescence atop an unbranched stem like a small sun. The outer flowers, ray flowers, attract pollinators. The tubiform florets in the center of the flower head, disk flowers, mature into edible fruits (sunflower seeds).

Sunflower prefers sunny areas. The flower can grow in any season, however, summer and winter are better. Blooming period is short, lasting for two through three weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowers year around, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Flower color golden yellow , mixed color

maintenance.pruning: Remove yellowing leaves and withered flowers timely
maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, every 10-15 days apply fertilizers once
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, put in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Moderately resistant to drought, keep soil moist, water every 1-2 days in summer, once 3-6 days in autumn and winter

basic.color: Flower color golden yellow , mixed color

basic.floral_language:
Helianthus annuus
Floriogrphy: sunny, warm, and optimistic.

The name sunflower may derive from the fact that shape of the flower's head resembles the sun, or from the false impression that the blooming plant appears to slowly turn its flower towards the sun as the latter moves across the sky on a daily basis. Generally, there is only a single large golden inflorescence atop an unbranched stem like a small sun. The outer flowers, ray flowers, attract pollinators. The tubiform florets in the center of the flower head, disk flowers, mature into edible fruits (sunflower seeds).

Sunflower prefers sunny areas. The flower can grow in any season, however, summer and winter are better. Blooming period is short, lasting for two through three weeks.

maintenance.pruning: Remove yellowing leaves and withered flowers timely

Hibiscus mutabilis
Floriography: noble, delicate, beautiful.
Confederate rose is the official flower of Chengdu city. Leaves crack at tips like a palm. Flowers are single petal or polyphyll, color changing by time from white or light red to dark red.
The plant grows best with plenty of light, slightly shade tolerant. It blooms in August to November for two to three weeks. New branches sprout in spring after dormancy in winter.

basic.floral_language:
Hibiscus syriacus
Floriography: gentle, pure, beautiful 
Hibiscus syriacus is a hardy deciduous shrub. Leaf shape is nearly the diamond, and with wavy sawtooth on leaf edges. Flower is bell shape, with single or double petal. Color is pure and fresh quietly elegant. Color includes white, pink, lavender, etc. Hibiscus syriacus is used as a hedge, hedge or garden ornament and indoor plants. 
Hibiscus syriacus like plenty of sunshine, a little resistance to shade. Flowering from July to October, with ornamental period, for 2-3 weeks at a time.

basic.floral_language:
Chimonanthus praecox 
Floriography: pride, strong and faithful 
Chimonanthus praecox blossom proudly in the snow, with orchid, bamboo, and chrysanthemum together referred to as the "four gentlemen" in the flower, has been named as the city flower of Wuhan. 
Chimonanthus praecox plant strong firm and pretty. Leaf blade elliptic, flowers are delicate and cabinet. Color is various, petals of 5 single and double. The fragrance of plum blossom is from bitter cold, a symbol of the Chinese nation strong spiritual quality. 
Chimonanthus praecox blossom like the sunshine, summer noon light should be covered. Because of the north-south differences, flowering in December to April of next year, with the ornamental period 1 to 2 weeks.

basic.floral_language:
Light yellow Phalaenopsis
Floriography: elegant, quiet, wise
Light yellow Phalaenopsis has beautiful flowers like butterflies in serene tropical rainforests, one of the three national flowers in Indonesia.
Light yellow Phalaenopsis has a graceful looking with light yellow flower colors, white aerial roots surround leaves and butterfly-like flowers.
Light yellow Phalaenopsis blooms normally in January-February for more than 1-2 months. With modern regulation techniques, Phalaenopsis amabilis can flower year around.

basic.floral_language:
Mammillaria marksiana 
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of the Mammillaria marksiana is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Mammillaria marksiana is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Mammillaria marksiana requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.

basic.floral_language:
Chimonanthus praecox 
Floriography: pride, strong and faithful 
Chimonanthus praecox blossom proudly in the snow, with orchid, bamboo, and chrysanthemum together referred to as the "four gentlemen" in the flower, has been named as the city flower of Wuhan. 
Chimonanthus praecox plant strong firm and pretty. Leaf blade elliptic, flowers are delicate and cabinet. Color is various, petals of 5 single and double. The fragrance of plum blossom is from bitter cold, a symbol of the Chinese nation strong spiritual quality. 
Chimonanthus praecox blossom like the sunshine, summer noon light should be covered. Because of the north-south differences, flowering in December to April of next year, with the ornamental period 1 to 2 weeks.

maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, remove peduncle after flowering
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray to the ambient environment in summer, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Apply fertilizers every 10-15 days in the growing seasons of spring and autumn, foliar fertilizer spray also do good for its growth , fertilize under 10 ℃ (50 ℉) is forbidden
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, in autumn and winter may take 2-3h sunlight, receive more light when leaves are dark green
maintenance.soil: Breathable and loose planting materials with coconut shell, bark or sphagnum moss

basic.blooming: Flowering period September-October, viewing period 3-7 days
basic.color: Leaf color tender green, flower color white or pink
basic.floral_language:
Mimosa pudica 
Floriography: shy, restrained, polite 
Mimosa is pure and fresh and lovely. It is named as shy grass because the leaves will be closed by external touch. 
Shy grass is green color. Leaves are lobular arrangement. Usually four lobules are palmy arrangement and look like a small palm, very lively. With the hand touch or water, petioles prolapse, lobular are closed. After the summer it will flower. Flower is white or pink velvet ball, charming and lovely. 
Mimosa like the sunshine, but avoid direct light. Flowering from September to October, with ornamental period of 3 to 7 days.

maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased, dead leaves and withered flowers timely
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray water on the leaves in summer, water less frequently in winter
maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate sunlight, avoid strong direct light

basic.color: Flower color red, pink, yellow, orange
basic.blooming: Blooms once every February-March months, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.floral_language:
Mini-rose
Mini-rose Fluorography: enthusiasm, brave and independent
Mini-rose is a rose family, was cultivated in the flower kingdom of the Netherlands.
Mini-rose has various colors, and its fragrance is quietly elegant. Inherited the fine quality of the rose family, but with a stature of cabinet and chic, Mini-rose was popular in Europe market at the beginning of the launch, and has become the new favorite of household and desktop decoration. 
Mini-rose likes the sun light, flowering for 2-3 weeks at a time. Bud sprouts after pruning, and under normal circumstances Mini-rose can be perpetual.

maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, put in sunny places, avoid strong sunlight in summer at noon
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, after flowering remove the upper part staring from 5 cm above soil surface, leaving 2-3 leaves
maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients

basic.blooming: Blooms once every February-March months, viewing period 2-3 weeks

Mini-rose Floriography: enthusiasm, brave and independent
Mini-rose is a rose family, was cultivated in the flower kingdom of the Netherlands.
Mini-rose has various colors, and its fragrance is quietly elegant. Inherited the fine quality of the rose family, but with a stature of cabinet and chic, Mini-rose was popular in Europe market at the beginning of the launch, and has become the new favorite of household and desktop decoration. 
Mini-rose likes the sun light, flowering for 2-3 weeks at a time. Bud sprouts after pruning, and under normal circumstances Mini-rose can be perpetual.

maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, after flowering remove the upper part staring from 5 cm above soil surface, leaving 2-3 leaves
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, put in sunny places, avoid strong sunlight in summer at noon
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients

basic.floral_language:
Mini-rose
Mini-rose Floriography: enthusiasm, brave and independent
Mini-rose is a rose family, was cultivated in the flower kingdom of the Netherlands.
Mini-rose has various colors, and its fragrance is quietly elegant. Inherited the fine quality of the rose family, but with a stature of cabinet and chic, Mini-rose was popular in Europe market at the beginning of the launch, and has become the new favorite of household and desktop decoration. 
Mini-rose likes the sun light, flowering for 2-3 weeks at a time. Bud sprouts after pruning, and under normal circumstances Mini-rose can be perpetual.
basic.blooming: Blooms once every February-March months, viewing period 2-3 weeks

basic.floral_language:
Monstera deliciosa
Floriography: health, happiness and energy 
Monstera deliciosa is the evergreen foliage plant. It has strong stem, and the aerial root of brown color, which can absorb water and nutrients in the air. Leaves are light green, peculiar shape, looking like a turtle, and coupled with much on stem section, much like bamboo, so it is called bamboo of curvature. Monstera deliciosa is often put in the sitting room, the facade, the beautification adornment effect. 
Monstera deliciosa likes the semi-shade environment, and it is grown in scattered light. Flowers are yellow-white spathe, and are generally difficult to bloom in domestic growth.
basic.color: Leaf color emerald green , bract light yellow

maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves timely
maintenance.soil: Peat mixed with coarse sand soil or hydroponics
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, every 15 days apply fertilizers once in April to Septermber
maintenance.sunlight: Relatively resistant to shade, likes half shade environments, leaves are fresh and green with some sunlight in winter
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, spray water in the surrounding environment to keep air moist, reduce watering in winter

basic.floral_language:
Murraya paniculata 
Floriography: white, noble, youthful
Is a small woody plant, evergreen, leaves fresh green in oval shape, flowers are clustered on the top of stems, normally 5 petals, has elegant fragrance. Often used for landscaping in yards, roadsides, or bonsai for indoor decoration. 
Likes sunshine, suitable for sunny places, avoid scorching sunlight in summer. Flowers are white.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers, white flowers

maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn

basic.color: Flower color blue, purple, white, yellow
basic.floral_language:
Myosotis scorpioides 
Floriography: sincerity, loyalty, warmth 
Myosotis scorpioides forms a beautiful blue flower, like a small curved umbrella. Flowers are small delicate, blooming just as its name implies, can continue for a long time, enough to be remembered in deep heart. Moreover, Myosotis scorpioides flowers do not fall after dying, can be made chic dried flower. 
Myosotis scorpioides like sunshine, blooming from May to July, ornamental period lasts three to four weeks
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-July, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
maintenance.soil: Likes slightly alkaline soil, may use peat adding a small amount of lime or baking soda,

basic.floral_language:
Myrtillocactus geometrizans 
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of the Myrtillocactus geometrizans is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Myrtillocactus geometrizans is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Myrtillocactus geometrizans requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.

basic.floral_language:
Nandina domestica 
Floriography: beautiful, propitious, enterprising
Nandina is a small shrub with lanceolate to oval leaves, in red when young, turning green when old, and in the autumn and winter turn bright red, very beautiful. Often used in the yard, street, parks, also be used for hedges and other types of landscaping.
Nandina is a shade-tolerant plant, suitable for bright scattered light, in winter can 2-3 hours sunlight. When conditions are right. Flowers in March to June with white flowers.

maintenance.pruning: Remove dead leaves timely

basic.floral_language:
Narcissus 'Dutch Master' 
Floriography: confident, pure, beautiful
Narcissus 'Dutch Master' is extremely graceful, like a river fairy. Two types: China Narcissus and Daffodils. Daffodils has white flowers, yellow bowl-shaped paracorolla (inner corolla), rich scent. Flowers in winter. Daffodils have many varieties, with varied inner corolla shapes, lighter and elegant scent, bloom normally in April-May.
Daffodils likes sunshine, also resistant to half shade, period of flower viewing 2-3 weeks. After flowering, leave the bulbs for sprouting in the coming year, may normally blossom for years.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-April, viewing period 1-2 weeks

maintenance.sunlight: Put in sunny places, resistant to half shade, dormant in summer under high temperature
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly only when soil is dry, reduce watering during flowering season, 1-2 times a week
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove the withered parts on the ground after flowering, leaving bulbs for germination in the next year
maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients

Floriography: confident, pure, beautiful
Narcissus 'Dutch Master' is extremely graceful, like a river fairy. Two types: China Narcissus and Daffodils. Daffodils has white flowers, yellow bowl-shaped paracorolla (inner corolla), rich scent. Flowers in winter. Daffodils have many varieties, with varied inner corolla shapes, lighter and elegant scent, bloom normally in April-May.
Daffodils likes sunshine, also resistant to half shade, period of flower viewing 2-3 weeks. After flowering, leave the bulbs for sprouting in the coming year, may normally blossom for years.

maintenance.sunlight: Put in sunny places, resistant to half shade, dormant in summer under high temperature
maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly only when soil is dry, reduce watering during flowering season, 1-2 times a week
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove the withered parts on the ground after flowering, leaving bulbs for germination in the next year

basic.blooming: Flowering period January-April, viewing period 1-2 weeks

Narcissus 'Dutch Master' is extremely graceful, like a river fairy. Two types: China Narcissus and Daffodils. Daffodils has white flowers, yellow bowl-shaped paracorolla (inner corolla), rich scent. Flowers in winter. Daffodils have many varieties, with varied inner corolla shapes, lighter and elegant scent, bloom normally in April-May.
Daffodils likes sunshine, also resistant to half shade, period of flower viewing 2-3 weeks. After flowering, leave the bulbs for sprouting in the coming year, may normally blossom for years.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-April, viewing period 1-2 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.pruning: Remove the withered parts on the ground after flowering, leaving bulbs for germination in the next year
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly only when soil is dry, reduce watering during flowering season, 1-2 times a week
maintenance.sunlight: Put in sunny places, resistant to half shade, dormant in summer under high temperature

basic.blooming: Flowering period January-April, viewing period 1-2 weeks

basic.floral_language:
Nelumbo nucifera
Floriography: upright, pure, beautiful.
Lotus is the official flower of Jinan city. The plant gracefully grows with big, nearly round leaves. Multiple colored flower, including white, pink and yellow, sits atop of a single tem alone like a graceful girl. The underground stem, appearing to be its root, is a valuable food source.
Lotus grows best with plenty of sunlight. Bloom in June to September for one to two weeks.

maintenance.watering: Aquatic plant, keep soil moist high
maintenance.soil: 1/3 of fertile silt and 2/3 water
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate sunlight
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased, dead leaves and withered flowers timely
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply liquid fertilizers once every 10-15 days in spring

basic.blooming: Flowering period April
basic.floral_language:
Neofinetia falcata
Floriography: virtuous, tender, intelligent
Neofinetia falcata, commonly referred to as the Chinese orchid, represents simplicity and serenity.
Neofinetia falcata are graceful with slender leaves and colorful, exotic flowers with pure colors and fragrances, though not as huge as the orchids flowers in the West, but very elegant. For its high ornamental value, often used to decorate rooms.
Neofinetia falcata like half shaded environments. Flowering time differs in different varieties throughout the year with a month-long flowering time, promptly cut the scape after flowering for germination in the next year.

maintenance.fertilization: Apply fertilizers every 10-15 days in the growing seasons of spring and autumn, foliar fertilizer spray also do good for its growth , fertilize under 10 ℃ (50 ℉) is forbidden
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray to the ambient environment in summer, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, remove peduncle after flowering
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, in autumn and winter may take 2-3h sunlight, receive more light when leaves are dark green
maintenance.soil: Breathable and loose planting materials with coconut shell, bark or sphagnum moss

basic.blooming: Flowering period mainly in winter and spring, viewing period 1-2 months
basic.color: Leaf color green, edges white, bracts red
basic.floral_language:
Neoregelia carolinae 'var. tricolor'
Floriography: auspicious, passionate, lucky.

Neoregelia carolinae 'var. tricolor' is a genus of flowering plants in the family Bromeliaceae, subfamily Bromelioideae. The genus, named for the Swedish botanist, zoologist, and anatomist Gustaf Johan Billberg. Leaves of Neoregelia carolinae 'var. tricolor' smooth and orderly arranged as a loose lotus flower. Inflorescence, growing from the middle of leaves, composes of bright colorful bracts and build a unique shape. Neoregelia carolinae 'var. tricolor' plants are widely grew in flower beds and family yards.

These plants grow best in mild sunlight. Bright sunlight should be avoided. Bloom in winter and spring for one to two months.

maintenance.watering: Like moist environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, water every day in summer, reduce water in winter
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased, dead leaves and withered flowers timely
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply liquid fertilizers once every 10-15 days in summer and autumn
maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, bright scattered light

basic.blooming: Flowering period mainly in winter and spring, viewing period 1-2 months
basic.color: Leaf color light green with white stripes, bract red

basic.floral_language:
Chimonanthus praecox 
Floriography: pride, strong and faithful 
Chimonanthus praecox blossom proudly in the snow, with orchid, bamboo, and chrysanthemum together referred to as the "four gentlemen" in the flower, has been named as the city flower of Wuhan. 
Chimonanthus praecox plant strong firm and pretty. Leaf blade elliptic, flowers are delicate and cabinet. Color is various, petals of 5 single and double. The fragrance of plum blossom is from bitter cold, a symbol of the Chinese nation strong spiritual quality. 
Chimonanthus praecox blossom like the sunshine, summer noon light should be covered. Because of the north-south differences, flowering in December to April of next year, with the ornamental period 1 to 2 weeks.

maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Moderately resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, top-dressing before and after flowering and defoliation

basic.blooming: Flowering period November-March, viewing period 1-2 weeks

Notocactus uebelmannianus 
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of the Notocactus uebelmannianus is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Notocactus uebelmannianus is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Notocactus uebelmannianus requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.

Ocimum basilicum 
Floriography: warm-hearted, vigorous, kindly
Basil is a spice herb used for cooking or herbal medicine, 
Has long oval fresh green leaves with strong fragrant scents, flowers are arranged like a multi-layer tower. Leaves are edible, for cooking, herbal tea, or medicine with effects of calming and pain relieving. 
Likes sunny places, need shade properly under summer strong sunlight, flowering in July to September, paly purple flower color.

Orange mini-rose
Orange mini-rose Floriography: enthusiasm, brave and independent
Orange mini-rose is a rose family, was cultivated in the flower kingdom of the Netherlands.
Orange mini-rose has various colors, and its fragrance is quietly elegant. Inherited the fine quality of the rose family, but with a stature of cabinet and chic, Orange mini-rose was popular in Europe market at the beginning of the launch, and has become the new favorite of household and desktop decoration. 
Orange mini-rose likes the sun light, flowering for 2-3 weeks at a time. Bud sprouts after pruning, and under normal circumstances Orange mini-rose can be perpetual.

basic.floral_language:
Pachyphytum cv.Momobijin 
Floriography: lovely, beautiful, warm.
Pachyphytum is a small genus of succulents in the Crassulaceae family. The name comes from the ancient Greek pachys (thick) and phyton (plant) after the thick leaves. The so called P. 'Blue Haze' or P. cv. MOMOBIJIN is the hybrid of P. bracteosum and P. glutinicaule. This cultivar possesses pink thick oval leaves with white powder covered. It looks prettier from distance with the pink cloth. The shape and arrange of the leaves make the plant look like a blooming Indian lotus from bird eye's view. 
The cultivar requires sunny habitat, turning white or green if it could not receive plenty of sunlight. Small red flowers bloom occasionally.

basic.floral_language:
Paeonia tenuifolia
Floriography: beautiful, warm, loyal 
Paeonia tenuifolia flower is a born beauty, equivalent to that of peony, who was a " Paeonia suffruticosa is the king, and Paeonia tenuifolia is the prime minister”.
Paeonia tenuifolia posture is elegant, flower shape is diverse, color is gorgeous, and scent. Besides used in home decoration and garden ornament, also can be used as a medicinal of heat-clearing and detoxifying. 
Paeonia tenuifolia like sunny places, natural flowering from May and June, viewing period 1 to 2 weeks for each flower. When flowers are wilted, trim withered leaves and flowers, waiting for germinate again in the coming year.

basic.floral_language:
Pailulacaria afra var.foliis-variegatis
Floriography: beautiful, vigorous, delicate
Is a special variety of Portulacaria afra, has an elegant plant form, fleshy thin leaves in nearly a heart shape, fresh green and marked by white or yellow patches, with abundant sunlight, stems turn purple red and leaf edges turn pink, grows fast and can be trimmed frequently for different shapes. 
Likes abundant sunlight, does not have an apparent dormant period. Flowers sometimes, light pink color.

basic.floral_language:
Pale pink mini-rose
Pale pink mini-rose Floriography: enthusiasm, brave and independent
Pale pink mini-rose is a rose family, was cultivated in the flower kingdom of the Netherlands.
Pale pink mini-rose has various colors, and its fragrance is quietly elegant. Inherited the fine quality of the rose family, but with a stature of cabinet and chic, Pale pink mini-rose was popular in Europe market at the beginning of the launch, and has become the new favorite of household and desktop decoration. 
Pale pink mini-rose likes the sun light, flowering for 2-3 weeks at a time. Bud sprouts after pruning, and under normal circumstances Pale pink mini-rose can be perpetual.
basic.blooming: Blooms once every February-March months, viewing period 2-3 weeks

basic.floral_language:
Parodia magnifica 
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of the Parodia magnifica is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Parodia magnifica is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Parodia magnifica requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.

basic.floral_language:
Parthenocissus henryana 
Floriography: tenacious, vigorous, perseverant
Parthenocissus henryana is a deciduous woody vine of beautiful leaf appearance, clinging to the wall by suckers, similar to pairs of feet, vivid and lovely. Often used as three-dimensional decorative material for green walls, park rockeries, can absorb dusts.
Parthenocissus henryana is a shade-tolerant plant, but not afraid of strong light, grows best in the shade. When conditions are right. Flowers in May to June sometimes with orange flowers.

Floriography: beautiful, novel, and sunny.
Pelargonium 'Angel Eyes' is an easy to grow variety of the genus Pelargonium.  Bloom colors are pink, purple or white.  Foliage are green, palm shaped.  Garden uses include beds, borders and family decorating.
Pelargonium 'Angel Eyes' grows well in places with plenty of sunlight in spring and autumn.  Note to shade approriately in fall.  Flower time from May to July, bloom lasts for two to three weeks.

basic.floral_language:
Pelargonium x peltatum
Floriography: beautiful, content, and sunny.
Pelargonium x peltatum is a plant with high vitality.  Bloom color can be red, pink, purple or orange.  Flower petal simple or polyphyll.  Leaves green and kidney-shaped.  Garden uses include beds, borders and family decorating.
Pelargonium x peltatum grows well in places with plenty of sunlight in spring and autumn.  Note to shade appropriately in fall.  Flower time from May to July, bloom lasts for two to three weeks.

basic.floral_language:
Peperomia 'Honey jasper' 
Floriography: fresh, vigorous, exquisite
Peperomia 'Honey jasper' is an evergreen foliage plant, also known as "Jasper". It has a miniature compact form, lavender-color (pale purple) stems, oval or nearly round leaves, young leaves fresh green like a half bean, then turning to shiny dark green, very vivid and lovely. Usually put in the study, living room, bedroom, adding greenness and vitality, is a popular plant.
Peperomia 'Honey jasper' likes half shade environment, good for bright scattered light. Sometimes blooms with slender flowers, but with little viewing value.

basic.floral_language:
Phaius tankervilleae
Floriography: virtuous, tender, intelligent
Phaius tankervilleae, commonly referred to as the Chinese orchid, represents simplicity and serenity.
Phaius tankervilleae are graceful with slender leaves and colorful, exotic flowers with pure colors and fragrances, though not as huge as the orchids flowers in the West, but very elegant. For its high ornamental value, often used to decorate rooms.
Phaius tankervilleae like half shaded environments. Flowering time differs in different varieties throughout the year with a month-long flowering time, promptly cut the scape after flowering for germination in the next year.

maintenance.soil: Breathable and loose planting materials with coconut shell, bark or sphagnum moss
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, remove peduncle after flowering
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray to the ambient environment in summer, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Apply fertilizers every 10-15 days in the growing seasons of spring and autumn, foliar fertilizer spray also do good for its growth , fertilize under 10 ℃ (50 ℉) is forbidden
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, in autumn and winter may take 2-3h sunlight, receive more light when leaves are dark green

basic.floral_language:
Phalaenopsis
Floriography: elegant, quiet, wise
Phalaenopsis amabilis has beautiful flowers like butterflies in serene tropical rainforests, one of the three national flowers in Indonesia.
Phalaenopsis amabilis has a graceful looking with various flower colors, white aerial roots surround leaves and butterfly-like flowers.
Phalaenopsis amabilis blooms normally in January-February for more than 1-2 months. With modern regulation techniques, Phalaenopsis amabilis can flower year around.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-July, viewing period up to 1-2 months
basic.color: Flower color light purple , pink, yellow, pure white

maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly, except flowering stages
maintenance.sunlight: Before flowering put under gentle sunlight, avoid direct strong light, when flowering put in places with scattered light
maintenance.soil: In sphagnum moss, replace once a year
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers and diseased leaves; remove peduncle after flowering, except the 2-3 segments at the bottom of peduncle, about 10cm
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly every 5-7 days, may water by put the soil in water, may spray water in the air in summer

basic.floral_language:
Phlox divaricata 
Floriography: generous, quiet and beautiful, and welcome.
Phlox divaricata is a short plant with cone shaped flowers on top of its stem. Color of flower are various, including pink, purple, red, rose red and mixed colors. The flower seats on five petals. Leaves are elongated round, green. It is usually planted in patches outdoor in yards, flower beds and parks or indoor for decoration.
This plant prefers mild sunlight, part shade tolerating, avoid direct sunlight in summer in growing. Flowering during May through October, lasts for two to three weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-October, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, water daily in summer
maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes moderate sunshine, also resistant to half shade

basic.floral_language:
Phnom Penh Chlorophytum
Floriography: tenacious, vigorous, goodly
Phnom Penh Chlorophytum is an evergreen foliage plant, like orchids, with long and narrow leaf blades, tender green marked by silver white stripes along edges. Interestingly, a mature spider plant may grow stems among leaf cluster and forming a small plant on the top, becoming lusher. Spider plants are usually placed in the living room, on desks, with an effect to clean air.
Phnom Penh Chlorophytum should avoid direct sunlight, placed under scattered light for better care, take sunshine in winter. May have white flowers sometimes.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers, white flowers

maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves timely
maintenance.soil: Peat mixed with coarse sand soil

Photinia glabra
Floriography: delicate, innocent, plain.
The photinia is an evergreen shrub or small tree. Leaves are long round oval, edge slightly toothed, red then turning green after mature. Small delicate flowers bloom clustery with great vitality. It has been widely cultivated for garden uses.
This plant grows well in sunny habitat but it is also shade tolerant. It blooms in April to May for one to two weeks.

basic.floral_language:
Pink Anthurium andraeanum
Pink Anthurium andraeanumFloriography: enthusiastic, bright, bold and unrestrained 
Pink Anthurium andraeanumis one of the world precious flowers, cultivated from the flower kingdom of the Netherlands. 
Pink Anthurium andraeanumflower such as fire, red bud is like a palm, tassel graceful palm a golden yellow flesh, vividly called spathe. Because of their enthusiasm is bold and unrestrained individual character, events like wedding or new store opening, choosing it as decoration, increase the festive atmosphere. 
Pink Anthurium andraeanummaintenance is simple, can bloom all year round, flowering for 2-3 months.

basic.floral_language:
Pink mini-rose
Pink mini-rose Floriography: enthusiasm, brave and independent
Pink mini-rose is a rose family, was cultivated in the flower kingdom of the Netherlands.
Pink mini-rose has various colors, and its fragrance is quietly elegant. Inherited the fine quality of the rose family, but with a stature of cabinet and chic, Pink mini-rose was popular in Europe market at the beginning of the launch, and has become the new favorite of household and desktop decoration. 
Pink mini-rose likes the sun light, flowering for 2-3 weeks at a time. Bud sprouts after pruning, and under normal circumstances Pink mini-rose can be perpetual.
basic.blooming: Blooms once every February-March months, viewing period 2-3 weeks

Pittosporum eugenioides
Floriography: persistent, handsome, tenacious.
This plant is a shrub or small tree. Leaf is inverse oval shaped, smooth at tips and leathery. Widely used as hedges, shape builders, and even as blending leaves for bouquets. 
It prefers sunny habitat, partial shade tolerant. Direct bright sunlight should be avoided in summer. Whitish yellow flowers may bloom in March to May if growing well.

basic.floral_language:
Plectranthus hadiensis var. tomentosus
Floriography: optimistic, brave, lively 
Plectranthus hadiensis var. tomentosus, as the name implies, one can smell apple fragrance by hand touching. 
The fleshy leaves are ovoid and light green with a layer of white short fluff on the surface. Apple aroma, refreshing. Besides ornamental value, it still can make tea and be edible. 
Plectranthus hadiensis var. tomentosus like the mild sunshine. Avoid direct light, otherwise easy to become yellow. When it is flowering, the flower colors are bright, include red, pink, blue, etc.

basic.floral_language:
Plectranthus scutellarioides 
Floriography: beautiful, kind, self-respect.
Coleus is a common foliage plant for its beautiful leaves. The plant is small and compact. Leaves are oval, toothed at edges with interlaced red, light yellow, purple and green patches on the surface. Grow of the coleus could be as easy as leaving it in a corner. Garden uses are for flower beds or blending leaves for bouquets.
The coleus prefers sunny habitat but direct bright sunlight should be avoided in summer. Light blue flowers may bloom in June to October if growing well.

Polyscias fruticosa
Floriography: tenacious, vital, happy.
Polyscias fruticosa is an evergreen foliage plant. Leaves are oval to round shape, green, occasionally with white patches on leaf surface. It is usually placed in living room, desktop and balcony. The plant could work as an air refresher.
Polyscias fruticosa prefers habitat with mild light, such as bright scatter light. Direct bright sunlight should be avoided. Light green flowers may bloom in March to June if growing well.

basic.floral_language:
Portulaca grandiflora 
Floriography: vivid, sunny, tough
Portulaca grandiflora commonly known as "sunrose", loves sunshine for better blossom, may not flower without enough sunlight.
Portulaca grandiflora has triangular-lanceolate leaves, solitary colorful flowers on top of stems or branches, like a little sun, vivid and lovely. Typically used for garden ornament or home furnishings.
Portulaca grandiflora likes plenty of sunlight, avoid direct sunlight in summer noon. Bloom in May-November for flower viewing in 2-3 weeks.

Portulaca molokiniensis
Floriography: blessed, grand, rich
The plant has strong stems often woody, with fleshy and round leaves like a pile of coins on the top, high ornamental value, often used in door as an evergreen foliar plant.
Likes abundant sunlight, tolerates to half shade, being dormant in summer, shade properly under scattered light. Flowers are yellow.

Portulacaria afra
Floriography: wealthy, vigorous, delicate

Primula beesiana likes gentle sunlight, avoid strong sunlight in summer noontime. Flowers in December-April for 1-2 weeks.

basic.floral_language:
Protea 
Floriography: tenacious, wealthy, gorgeous
Protea also known as "Bodhi flower", revered as South Africa's national flower.
Protea has a peculiar shape with oval leaves and huge exotic flowers of a rarely seen form, mimic a rosette, has white to red color. Suitable for potted ornamental planting, can be an ideal material for cut flowers and dried flowers.
Protea likes sunny places, but shade properly under strong summer sunlight. Flowering time from May to December for viewing in 5-7 months.

basic.floral_language:
Prunus armeniaca
Floriography: shy, pure, noble
Prunus armeniaca is a pretty tree with broad ovate leaves. Flower in clusters blossom before leaf growth. Flowers are single-layer or multi-layer petals with fresh and elegant colors, turning to pure white during the flowering period. Commonly used in yard landscaping, also making bonsai.
Prunus armeniaca likes adequate sunlight. Flowering from March to April for 1-2 weeks.

Tillandsia cyanea
Floriography: auspicious, passionate, lucky.

Tillandsia cyanea is a genus of flowering plants in the family Bromeliaceae, subfamily Bromelioideae. The genus, named for the Swedish botanist, zoologist, and anatomist Gustaf Johan Billberg. Leaves of Tillandsia cyanea smooth and orderly arranged as a loose lotus flower. Inflorescence, growing from the middle of leaves, composes of bright colorful bracts and build a unique shape. Tillandsia cyanea plants are widely grew in flower beds and family yards.

These plants grow best in mild sunlight. Bright sunlight should be avoided. Bloom in winter and spring for one to two months.
basic.color: Bract blue purple, flower color blue purple

maintenance.watering: Like moist environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, water every day in summer, reduce water in winter

Tradescantia spathacea
Floriography: health, longevity, vitality 
Tradescantia spathacea is a kind of evergreen foliage plants. Because of its sleek large blades it is appreciated by the public. 
Tradescantia spathacea plant stature is elegant, has many branches. Leaf blades are elliptic, slightly leathery, dark green, decorated with white or light yellow patches on the surface, which greatly increase the ornamental value.   Tradescantia spathacea is resistant to shade, is suitable for the scattered light in the bright place. Maintained properly, it also can flower during May and June. Flowers are pale yellow.

maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, avoid saturated water, reduce watering and fertilization in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly in spring
maintenance.soil: Peat mixed with coarse sand soil
maintenance.sunlight: Relatively resistant to shade, likes half shade environments
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves timely

maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, more watering during fruiting period

Turbinicarpus pseudopectinatus
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of theTurbinicarpus pseudopectinatus is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Turbinicarpus pseudopectinatus is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Turbinicarpus pseudopectinatus requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.

maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, put in sunny places, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring to autumn
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering in winter dormancy
maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio

basic.color: Bract orange red, orange, purple, peach red, mainly yellow flowers

Chimonanthus praecox 
Floriography: pride, strong and faithful 
Chimonanthus praecox blossom proudly in the snow, with orchid, bamboo, and chrysanthemum together referred to as the "four gentlemen" in the flower, has been named as the city flower of Wuhan. 
Chimonanthus praecox plant strong firm and pretty. Leaf blade elliptic, flowers are delicate and cabinet. Color is various, petals of 5 single and double. The fragrance of plum blossom is from bitter cold, a symbol of the Chinese nation strong spiritual quality. 
Chimonanthus praecox blossom like the sunshine, summer noon light should be covered. Because of the north-south differences, flowering in December to April of next year, with the ornamental period 1 to 2 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period November-March, viewing period 1-2 weeks

Yellow Crocus spp. 
Floriography: happy, sweet, vitality 
Yellow Crocus spp. is also called the saffron, is a kind of dwarf bulb flowers. 
Saffron flowers are usually the goblet shape, elegant delicate, Flower color is rich. Most of saffron has a fragrant smell, and they can be planted in a shallow basin used in indoor decoration. 
Saffron likes the sunshine, also is resistant to semi-shade, the flowering period is 2-3 month, available for viewing for 1-2 weeks. Keep the bulbs for germination in the coming year, and then under normal circumstances it will blossom for many years.

maintenance.sunlight: Likes adequate sunshine, also resistant to half shade, dormant in summer with high temperature,
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply fertilizers once every 10-15 days in spring, except flowering stages
maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely

basic.blooming: Blooms once every February-March months, viewing period 2-3 weeks

Yellow mini-rose
Yellow mini-rose Floriography: enthusiasm, brave and independent
Yellow mini-rose is a rose family, was cultivated in the flower kingdom of the Netherlands.
Yellow mini-rose has various colors, and its fragrance is quietly elegant. Inherited the fine quality of the rose family, but with a stature of cabinet and chic, Yellow mini-rose was popular in Europe market at the beginning of the launch, and has become the new favorite of household and desktop decoration. 
Yellow mini-rose likes the sun light, flowering for 2-3 weeks at a time. Bud sprouts after pruning, and under normal circumstances Yellow mini-rose can be perpetual.

maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, put in sunny places, avoid strong sunlight in summer at noon
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, after flowering remove the upper part staring from 5 cm above soil surface, leaving 2-3 leaves
maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
